metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9779 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: OCaml compiler allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors, a similar issue to CVE-2017-9772 "but with much less impact."

notes.Note: msalvatore> I believe this CVE has to do with unsafe handling of the TMPDIR environment variable in setuid binaries. Possible commits to resolve this are the same as those for CVE-2017-9772 binaries built with ocamlopt will need to be rebuilt after a system upgrade

criterions.comment: ocaml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
